perturbation.original_text: If Reseller fails to submit Orders with an aggregate value equal to or greater than the MOQ, then Reseller shall pay Supplier a sum equal to the shortfall, within 30 days after the end of the Initial Term. Upon payment of such amount, Seller shall deliver the Products paid for to Reseller in a commercially reasonable timeframe (and in no event any later than 150 days from the date such payment is received in full) to be sold by Reseller in accordance with this Agreement as contemplated by the last sentence of Section 12.4.
perturbation.changed_text: If Reseller fails to submit Orders with an aggregate value equal to or greater than the MOQ, then Reseller shall pay Supplier a sum equal to the shortfall, within 60 days after the end of the Initial Term. Upon payment of such amount, Seller shall deliver the Products paid for to Reseller in a commercially reasonable timeframe (and in no event any later than 90 days from the date such payment is received in full) to be sold by Reseller in accordance with this Agreement as contemplated by the last sentence of Section 12.4.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the payment deadline for the shortfall from 30 to 60 days. It also changes the maximum delivery timeframe from 150 to 90 days. This creates uncertainty about the actual payment and delivery terms, potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Following the Initial Term, either Party may terminate this Agreement without cause upon written notice to the other Party of at least 3 months.
perturbation.changed_text: Following the Initial Term, either Party may terminate this Agreement without cause upon written notice to the other Party of at least 6 months.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the written notice period from 3 to 6 months required for terminating the agreement without cause, creating ambiguity and potential for dispute.

perturbation.original_text: All notices or other communications hereunder shall be in writing and shall be given in person, by courier or by registered mail (provided that written confirmation of receipt is provided) addressed as set forth in the heading of this Agreement or such other address as any Party may designate to the other in accordance with this procedure. All communications delivered in person or by courier service shall be deemed to have been received upon delivery, shall be deemed to have been received on the business day following transmission with confirmed answer back, and all notices and other communications sent by registered mail shall be deemed to have been received within 3 business days after posting.
perturbation.changed_text: All notices or other communications hereunder shall be in writing and shall be given in person, by courier or by email (provided that electronic confirmation of receipt is provided) addressed as set forth in the heading of this Agreement or such other address as any Party may designate to the other in accordance with this procedure. All communications delivered in person or by courier service shall be deemed to have been received upon delivery, shall be deemed to have been received immediately upon transmission with confirmed answer back, and all notices and other communications sent by email shall be deemed to have been received within 1 business days after sending.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the type of communication from registered mail to email. It also changes the time it takes to be received from 3 business days to 1 business days after sending. This creates uncertainty about the actual notification, potentially leading to disputes.
